data.title: Sharon Brown
data.text:
Residence Life Coordinator for Greek Village

greekvillage@uca.edu

(501) 470-7229

Sharon Brown is an Alumna of UCA having received her Bachelors of Business Administration in Insurance & Risk Management in 2017. As a native of Little Rock she returned home after receiving her BBA and continued to work in a customer service capacity. In January of 2019 Sharon received her first role in Education as a Financial Aid Advisor for Diesel Driving Academy. This is where she found her love for assisting students with their Education. Sharon migrated to Jonesboro, Arkansas and completed her Master of Science in College Student Personnel Services at Arkansas State University in August 2021 (where she also worked FT in Financial Aid). After graduating Sharon began working at the University of Memphis as a Financial Aid Counselor.

Sharon is currently the Residence Life Coordinator for Greek Village+. She has been with the University since August 2022 and is excited to be home and able to give back to her community.
